thread.title: Netflix adds 3.62M subscribers in 3Q, but US growth lags

title: Netflix adds 3.62M subscribers in 3Q, but US growth lags
text:
> Business Netflix adds 3.62M subscribers in 3Q, but US growth lags FILE - In this file image released by Netflix, Taylor Schilling, left, and Laura Prepon appear in a scene from the Netflix original series, "Orange is the New Black." Netflix reports quarterly financial results on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. (JoJo Whilden/Netflix via AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
